New_York.Chinese Radio New York: Chinese Radio New York (Chinese: 紐約中文電台; pinyin: Niǔ Yuē Zhōngwén Diàntái; Jyutping: nau2 joek3 zung1 man4 din6 toi4) is a Cantonese-dialect broadcast originating from New York City. The program is simulcast to Philadelphia on WNWR Mondays to Fridays 3 p.m.–8 p.m. On February 1, 2007, Chinese Radio New York started a 24-hour station on the 67 kHz subcarrier of WPAT-FM 93.1.
